properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 3 at 5:03AM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service Office in Riverton.

* WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph.
Localized higher gusts around 60 mph possible. Higher winds in
the mountains.

* WHERE...Eastern slopes of the Absaroka Mountains into the
adjacent Cody Foothills. The strongest winds across the Cody
Foothills will occur between Cody and Clark.

* WHEN...Late tonight into Wednesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation along Highway 120. There
could be control issues especially for light and high profile
vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
